name: Locomotive subwai Game
description:
Z to put on the engine, S to put off

Q or D to move the locomotive, impossible if you don't have 1 speed

hit a other loco or station explode your train. if the timer go to 0:0 yoour train explode.

hit a people or a car give a negative score.

go through the station to have more time.

good luck and say your best score !
